body:

Looks like slice.h and slice_buffer.c will need to include stdbool.h

Ah fun. slice.h can't: it needs to stay c89. Fix tomorrow.

On Wed, Apr 12, 2017, 10:47 PM Noah Eisen <notifications@github.com> wrote:

> Looks like slice.h and slice_buffer.c will need to include stdbool.h

I suspect this is going to need a little more work before it's ready for review. Removing reviewers for now.

Something about this is making bm_fullstack unhappy.

Also some ASAN tests are red. Can't tell if they are flakes or leaks.

Updated - turns out that we can't just ref in the passthru endpoint anymore.

For future readers: I expect in-process microbenchmarks to regress with this PR, and that's ok. We're more concerned with TCP performance.

generate_project and clang_format need to be run. Also looks like this may have cause some of the mac tests to timeout? That one might be a flake though. Also would like to see the microbenchmarks run on this.
